name: SpeedCube++
description:
A remake of my game SpeedCube in C++!

This was made as a challenge for myself, as this is my first C++ game! I decided to remake 'SpeedCube', a game I made a short while ago so I could learn the language

//If input stops working, go into fullscreen, click the screen and then go out of fullscreen

All code and assets for in this game are here if you want to check it out
